law.catch_line: Regular inspections of dams and reservoirs.
law.text: The public safety and welfare requiring it, the secretary shall conduct a program of regular inspections of dams and reservoirs within the state. The frequency of such inspections shall be as determined by the secretary, who may establish different inspection intervals.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(9). -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 9.
